scripts.clean: node-gyp clean && rm -rf release* bin/ src/view/wp.sp src/view/tmp.sp
scripts.clean-win: node-gyp clean && DEL /S/Q src\view\wp.sp src\view\tmp.sp && RD /S/Q bin release-builds
scripts.builder: node-gyp configure && node-gyp rebuild && npm run rebuild
scripts.mac: npm run package-mac && npm run installer-mac
scripts.linux: npm run package-linux && npm run installer-linux
scripts.win: npm run package-win && npm run installer-win
scripts.install-all: npm run builder && npm run mac && npm run linux && npm run win
scripts.install: npm run clean && npm run install-all
scripts.upgrade: sudo npm install -g npm && sudo npm install -g node-gyp && npm install --save nan && npm install --save bindings && npm install -g bindings && npm install --save-dev rebuild && npm install --save-dev electron && npm install --save-dev electron-packager && npm install electron-packager -g && npm install --save electron-rebuild && npm install --save jquery && npm install --save-dev asar && npm install --save electron-log && npm install electron-installer-dmg --save-dev && npm install electron-installer-dmg -g && npm install --save-dev electron-installer-windows && npm install -g electron-installer-windows && npm install --save-dev  electron-installer-debian && npm install -g electron-installer-debian && npm install --save-dev csv-parser && npm install csv-parser -g && npm install --save-dev node-abi
